physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Mild hypertonia in all 4 extremities, mostly on the left side; positive head retraction reflex; wide-based, toddling gait; brisk deep tendon reflexes on all 4 limbs, except the left knee (1/4); otherwise normal examination.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: On follow-up examination, the head retraction reflex is absent, indicating improvement.
